body:
These errors happen during the build of golang on ppc64 if I build with CGO_ENABLED=1.
They don't happen if CGO_ENABLED is not set.

Under ##### Building packages and commands for linux/ppc64.
.....
cmd/pprof
net/rpc/jsonrpc
# cmd/trace
